Transform Your Home with Maco Painting's Residential Services

Professional painting solutions tailored for your home's unique style and character

Scroll

Transform your home with Maco Painting — a trusted name in residential painting for over 20 years. Serving Chester, Delaware, and Montgomery counties, as well as the Main Line, we specialize in interior and exterior painting services that protect, beautify, and elevate your living space.

Why Choose Maco Painting for Your Home?

  • Expert Craftsmanship: Our trained team ensures every detail meets the highest standards.
  • Meticulous Surface Preparation: We use the Festool Dustless Sander for cleaner, healthier prep work.
  • Customer Satisfaction Guaranteed: Transparent communication, clean job sites, and beautiful results.

Our Residential Services

Comprehensive painting and finishing solutions for every area of your home.

Interior Painting

Wall and ceiling painting, priming, and trim finishes using premium paints. We transform your interior spaces with meticulous attention to detail and superior materials.

Learn more about Interior Painting

Exterior Painting

Siding, trim, decks, fences, and more — weather-protected with expert prep and precision application techniques that ensure lasting beauty and protection.

Explore Exterior Painting Services

Drywall & Trim Work

Professional drywall patching, seaming, baseboards, crown molding, wainscoting, and more for a flawless foundation to your home's beauty.

Discover Drywall & Trim Work

Cabinet Refinishing

Kitchen cabinet painting and staining with modern colors and protective finishes that transform your kitchen without the cost of replacement.

Learn About Cabinet Refinishing

Residential Epoxy Floors

Epoxy coatings for garages, basements, and home spaces. Slip-resistant, long-lasting, and available in numerous decorative options that can transform any floor into a stunning focal point.

Epoxy Floors for Your Home

Our Advanced Preparation Techniques

Great painting starts with proper preparation. Our use of the Festool Dustless Sanding System ensures a flawless finish while significantly reducing airborne dust particles, creating a healthier environment for your family during the painting process.

Professional Equipment & Premium Materials

We use only top-quality paints from leading manufacturers like Sherwin Williams and Benjamin Moore, applied with professional techniques and equipment that ensure a beautiful, durable finish.

Quality Results That Last

Our meticulous preparation, premium materials, and expert craftsmanship combine to create beautiful spaces that stand the test of time.
